title: The 250GB Mega Storage iPhone!
description: (   ) --- Today's Mystery Video -   Sandisk iXpand + 128GB iPhone 6S for a total of 256GB -   This 128GB storage case from Sandisk can expand your overall iPhone storage up to 256GB (when starting with the 128GB iPhone 6S). Other colors and capacities are also available.  FOLLOW ME IN THESE PLACES FOR UPDATES Twitter -  Facebook -  Instagram -  Google Plus -
